nearestPolice.response: Nearest police station: Use 112 or visit the nearest Police Help Booth shown on the map. Keep your ID ready.

emergencySteps.response: If it's an emergency: Move to a safe, lit area. Press the Panic button to alert contacts and authorities.

fileReport.response: To file a report: Use the e-FIR form in the app with details and submit. You will get a reference number.

areaSafety.response: Area safety is based on risk zones and time of day. Avoid restricted or high-risk zones at night.

chatbot.fallback: I did not understand. You can ask: 'Is this area safe?' or 'How to file a report?'.
